title: While setting values for the NI PCI 6733 DAQ...

content.raw:
I got this strange error raised in blacs when I tried to run my script. The script had a bunch of commands like these:

Li72DP_amp.constant(Li72DP_amp.t0, 0.5)

which compiled ok, but once I tried to run in blacs gave rise to the attached error.
No idea what the root cause is. I tried to use the same syntax as in the example python file. The blacs gui can still be used to set values on the daq, but whenever I try to use a script it runs into trouble.

Regards

Jesse Evans
